name: Off the Wall Dodgeball (S2021 Team 12)
description:
Description: Off the Wall Dodgeball is an old school, arcade style game where the objective is to throw dodgeballs at waves of enemies to get them out.  However, you must be accurate with your throws. After all, if you miss an enemy, your dodgeballs will bounce off of the walls, and they will be able to hurt you! Therefore, the more inaccurate you are, the more likely you are to lose the game. 

How far will you be able to make it?!

-Controls:

      Aim - point mouse cursor at target

      Shoot - left click

      A - move left

      D - move right

      W - move up

      S - move down

      Space - Dash

-Goals:

      Avoid all dodgeballs (including the ones you’ve thrown)

      Defeat all enemies

      Obtain power ups through consecutive hits

-Power Ups:

      Shield: Makes you invincible for 3 seconds

      Explosive Ball: A ball that kills all the enemies in a certain radius

      Anti-Bounce: Your balls will not bounce off of the walls for 5 seconds

-Enemies:

      Follower Enemies: These enemies will follow you around the court

      Random Enemies: These enemies will move in random, unpredictable directions

      Shield Enemies: These enemies have temporary shields that flash on and off
